name: Achichi @Ignister
text: If this card is Normal or Special Summoned: You can add 1 Level 4 or lower "@Ignister" monster from your Deck to your hand, except "Achichi @Ignister". At the start of the Damage Step, when your Cyberse monster battles: You can banish this card from your GY; destroy that monster you control. You can only use each effect of "Achichi @Ignister" once per turn.
